name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Anya continues presenting her birthday acrylic keychain, explaining its various uses.
Anya introduces and showcases the Mirror merchandise, highlighting its design and portability.
Anya moves on to the Voice Pack, mentioning that she wrote the script herself as she does every year.
Anya explains the bonuses for purchasing the complete merchandise set, including a postcard with a foil-stamped autograph and script translations for the voice pack.
Anya reveals an additional special bonus for the complete set: a card for the hololive Official Card Game.
